dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/csv --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { id: payload01.id as :string, stuff: payload01.stuff replace "\\\\{2}" with "\\\\" })

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/csv --- payload map { id: $.id as :string, stuff: (($.stuff replace /\n/ with "\\\\n") replace /\r/ with "\\\\r") replace /\t/ with "\\\\t" }
